name: EFT
description:
EFT

GET READY TO ESCAPE WITH EFT

Our adventure starts out with our hero allowing himself to be captured in order to get into a castle dungeon, after he hears a rumor about there being a large and unusual treasure hidden there. But uh-oh! His friend is captured as well. Now, he must find the treasure and find his friend before it is too late.
Let's fight you to escape from this dungeon!
But watch out for the guards, they can catch you at any time.
Be very carefull !

Features

Health System

Artificial Intelligence Npc

2d Graphics

Optimized Graphics

Simple and understandable

Stylistic graphics

Easy gameplay and game mechanics

Computer friendly graphics

Quality sound effects created in a studio environment


eft is an indie game that continues to be actively developed. We are doing our best for our game. We also listen to your feedback on our game and correct our mistakes. Please send us your opinions and thoughts about eft.
Our game has potential success.
As an indie game developer we work really hard to make our game really good.
You can send us your thoughts and suggestions about our game.
We consider and listen to the suggestions of the community. Our goal is to give players fun and satisfaction.
